events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund or an exchange as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to customer's request for money back or exchange.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I'm here to help you with your refund request regarding the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I've attached a photo showing the wrong product I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt response and help with this refund process.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your refund and if there's anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything is perfect now, thank you for your help!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing this case now. Feel free to reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
